summary: An ordinance providing for the construction of a trunk sanitary sewer system together with an outfall sewer to be known as the Delridge Trunk Sewer, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16873 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district, payable by the mode of "Payments by Bonds", and adopting the maps, plans and specifications for such improvement.
